definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to be too petty or insignificant to mention/to not be worth mentioning (idiom)

sentences.english: New forms are simply canonization of inferior genres.
sentences.chinese: 百凡新体，只是向来卑不足道之体忽然列品入流。

definition: little virtue and meager abilities (idiom); I'm a humble person and not much use at anything (Song writer Ouyang Xiu 欧阳修)

semiliterate/only knows words of one syllable/lit. to know only 之[zhi1] and 無|无[wu2]
lit. cannot tell beans from wheat (idiom); fig. ignorant of practical matters
